Splitting Data Into Train And Test Set

Source: R/split_data.R
split_data.Rd

split_data divide the data frame with given target and type into data train and data test set with adjustable ratio.

split_data(data, target, type, ratio = 0.8)

Arguments

data

data.frame, matrix, data.table or dgCMatrix - training data set to create model, if data_test = NULL, then data will be automatically divided into training and testing dataset. NOTE: data has to contain the target column.
target

character: name of the target column, should be character and has to be column name in data.
type

character: defining the task. Two options are: "regression" and "classification", particularly, binary classification.
ratio

numeric, ranged from between 0 and 1, indicating the proportion of data train over original data set.

Value

A list of data train and data test.

Contents

Developed by Hoang Thien Ly, Szymon Szmajdzinski, Anna Kozak.
